meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Eric Turner Ben Juster Terry O'Shea Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6777.

td.p: Eric Turner, a senior from Vanderbilt University from Huntsville, Alabama
Ben Juster, a senior at UCLA from Woodland Hills, California
Terry O'Shea, a sophomore at Princeton University from Bridgewater, New Jersey

tr.td: A GREEK MYTHTAKE
ANAGRAM PAIRS
(Alex: We'll need two words in each response.)
OTHER LONE STAR FLAGS
THAT DRESS NEEDS SOMETHING
COMING UP IN 2014
CELEBRITIES & THE LAW

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'She rejected the advances of Pan... an... an, who then drove shepherds mad... ad... ad & they tore her to pieces... eces... eces')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: She rejected the advances of Pan... an... an, who then drove shepherds mad... ad... ad & they tore her to pieces... eces... eces

$4,201
string theory')

The name of this theory is from viewing sub-atomic particles as 1-dimensional objects, not as 0-dimensional points
Terry
Ben
Eric
Finalist

3rd place: $10,000
Terry
Ben
Eric

(including 2 DDs),
3 W

3 W
(including 1 DD)
